sentences.english: For the general follower, it is the sacred object is which worshiped and culted.
sentences.chinese: 對於一般信徒，它是供奉禮拜神佛的神聖對象。

sentences.english: There are numerous other deities who are conceptualized in many forms.
sentences.chinese: 還有許多其他神佛的人概念化的形式有多種。

sentences.english: A building used for the worship of a god or gods in some religions.
sentences.chinese: 指供奉神佛的廟宇，有時也指其他宗教的修道院。

definition: Daoist immortal/supernatural entity/(in modern fiction) fairy, elf, leprechaun etc/fig. lighthearted person
god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
